title: Bizarre cults
creator_credit: 21st Century Film Corporation, Ellis Elias, John Thompson and Ashley Sidaway
brief_description: Narrated by Sir David Frost, this program gives a brief overview of some of the major cults from around the world and includes information about what they believe and how they were founded. Cults covered include: Charles Manson’s family; Branch Davidians; Aum Shrinriko, Moonies; the Order of the Solar Temple; Children of God; Hare Krishnas; Druidism; Flagellants; the Spacepeople of Damanhur; the Church of Scientology; Evangelism; Jehovah’s Witness; Voodooism. Personalities covered include: Charles Manson; David Koresh; Shoko Asohara; L. Ron Hubbard; Tammy and Jim Baker.
